languages.text: "Моналик Кадд, хормейстер астропатического хора, избранный после кончины наставника Вайса, пока указом {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Астра Телепатика{/g} флагману не припишут нового хормейстера".

traits.locale_text: "Моналик Кадд, временный хормейстер астропатического хора, избранный после кончины Заккари Вайса. Буду служить вам на сем посту до тех пор, пока указом со Святой Терры флагману не припишут нового хормейстера".

languages.text: "Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Master Weisz's death until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Моналик Кадд, хормейстер астропатического хора, избранный после кончины наставника Вайса, пока указом {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Астра Телепатика{/g} флагману не припишут нового хормейстера".

traits.locale_text: "Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Mentor Weisz's demise until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the Astra Telepathica."

"Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Master Weisz's death until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}."

languages.text: « Monalic Qadd, maître de chœur intérimaire, élu suite à la mort de maître Weisz, et ce jusqu'à ce qu'un nouveau maître de chœur soit assigné au vaisseau amiral par décret de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Master Weisz's death until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Monalic Qadd, maître de chœur intérimaire, élu suite à la mort de maître Weisz, et ce jusqu'à ce qu'un nouveau maître de chœur soit assigné au vaisseau amiral par décret de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}. »

languages.text: «Monalic Qadd, maestro del Coro de Astrópatas en funciones tras la muerte del maestro Weisz y hasta que el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g} ordene el nombramiento de un nuevo maestro del Coro».
languages.original_text: "Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Master Weisz's death until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Monalic Qadd, maestro del Coro de Astrópatas en funciones tras la muerte del maestro Weisz y hasta que el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g} ordene el nombramiento de un nuevo maestro del Coro».

languages.text: 「モナリック・カッド、感応通信聖歌隊のクワイアーマスター代理です。マスター・ワイズの死去に伴い、新しいクワイアーマスターが旗艦に任命されるまでの間、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}銀河感応逓信局{/g}により選出されました」
languages.original_text: "Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Master Weisz's death until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「モナリック・カッド、感応通信聖歌隊のクワイアーマスター代理です。マスター・ワイズの死去に伴い、新しいクワイアーマスターが旗艦に任命されるまでの間、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}銀河感応逓信局{/g}により選出されました」

languages.text: “我是莫纳里克·恰德。威茨大师去世之后，我暂时担任星语唱诗班的代理唱诗大师，直到{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}星语庭{/g}为这艘船指派新的唱诗大师为止。”
languages.original_text: "Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Master Weisz's death until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “我是莫纳里克·恰德。威茨大师去世之后，我暂时担任星语唱诗班的代理唱诗大师，直到{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}星语庭{/g}为这艘船指派新的唱诗大师为止。”

languages.text: "Monalic Qadd, amtierender Chormeister des astropathischen Chors, nach dem Tod von Meister Weisz gewählt, bis dem Flaggschiff auf Erlass des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g} ein neuer Chormeister zugeteilt wird."
languages.original_text: "Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Master Weisz's death until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Monalic Qadd, amtierender Chormeister des astropathischen Chors, nach dem Tod von Meister Weisz gewählt, bis dem Flaggschiff auf Erlass des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g} ein neuer Chormeister zugeteilt wird."

languages.text: "Monalic Qadd, Üstat Weisz'ın ölümünün ardından {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}'nın emriyle sancak gemisine yeni bir Koro Şefi atanana dek hizmet etmek üzere Astropatik Koro'nun Koro Şefi vekili olarak seçildim."
languages.original_text: "Monalic Qadd, acting Choirmaster of the Astropathic Choir, elected following Master Weisz's death until such time as a new Choirmaster is assigned to the flagship by decree of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathicaGlossary}Adeptus Astra Telepathica{/g}."
